channel.title: Softlayer_network_interconnect_tenant on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Softlayer_network_interconnect_tenant on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Interconnect_Tenant
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Interconnect_Tenant Service Datatype Description A network interconnect tenant defines an IP routing path through a network interconnect. Each network interconnect requires a single primary tenant, indicated by the primaryFlag Methods allowDeleteConnection createConnection deleteConnection editConnection getAllConnections getAllObjects getAllPortLabelsWithCurrentUsage getBillingItem Retrieve the active billing item for a network interconnect.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Interconnect_Tenant
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Interconnect_Tenant Service Datatype Description Local accountId Type: integer bgpAsn Specifies ASN used for BGP. Type: integer createDate Type: dateTime errorMessage Type: string globalRoutingFlag The Direct Link connectivity to all SoftLayer data centers if globalRoutingFlag = 1 and local connectivity if globalRoutingFlag = 0. Type: boolean id Type: integer
